title: Did Democrats refuse to defend the widow of the Navy?
subtitle: A picture that had nothing to do with Keith Ellison and Debbie Wasserman Schultz was apparently used to claim that Democrats refused to honour a Navy widow during a presidential speech.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: :: Democrats Bernie Sanders, Keith Ellison, Debbie Wasserman Schultz, and Nancy Belusi refused to stand and applause to the Navy widow C.L. Karen Owens during a presidential speech.
